name: ScalarToRGBColormapImageFilter

members.name: UseInputImageExtremaForScaling
members.detaileddescriptionSet: Set/Get UseInputImageExtremaForScaling. If true, the colormap uses the min and max values from the image to scale appropriately. Otherwise, these values can be set in the colormap manually.
members.detaileddescriptionGet: Set/Get UseInputImageExtremaForScaling. If true, the colormap uses the min and max values from the image to scale appropriately. Otherwise, these values can be set in the colormap manually.

briefdescription: Implements pixel-wise intensity->rgb mapping operation on one image.
